body_content.explanation: a metal part attached to a bicycle, motorcycle, etc. that is used to support it when it is not moving and no one is riding it:
examples: The bikes have baskets and kickstands.
He kicks the kickstand up with his left foot, then swings his other leg over the motorcycle and climbs on.

body_content.explanation: a part on a tablet computer, mobile phone, etc. that supports it when you want it to be vertical:
examples: A kickstand built into the back makes it easy to watch videos on the go.
My phone had a very flimsy looking kickstand.
